deity_markdown: [Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197), Alseta, Calistria, Desna, Findeladlara, Ketephys, Yuelral
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The traditional deities of the elven pantheon are [Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=3), [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5), [Findeladlara](/Deities.aspx?ID=109) (goddess of twilight and traditional art and architecture), [Ketephys](/Deities.aspx?ID=110) (god of hunting and the moon), and [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=111) (goddess of gems, craft, and magic). Elves have also adopted [Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=30), a minor goddess of doors and transitions, as their patron of teleportation and aiudara (commonly known as elf gates). Most elves value magic, beauty, freedom, and friendship as part of a fulfilling life and tend to worship all of the deities together as exemplars of these values. Alongside full-blooded elves, many half-elves—whether raised by elves or seeking a closer connection to their elven heritage— worship the elven pantheon.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Pantheons
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=18)

**Edicts** learn and appreciate traditional elven arts, crafts, and magic, explore the worlds outside and within

**Anathema** irreparably damage the natural environment (such as by overhunting or strip mining), have an unhealthy obsession or attachment

**Area of Concern**
elves, magic, nature, tradition

**Follower Alignments**
NG, CG, CN

**Pantheon Members**
[Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=30), [Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=3), [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5), [Findeladlara](/Deities.aspx?ID=109), [Ketephys](/Deities.aspx?ID=110), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=111)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

**Favored Weapon** [Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76) or [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=19), [Moon](/Domains.aspx?ID=21), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282)

- **2nd**
[Shape Wood](/Spells.aspx?ID=277)

- **5th**
[Tree Stride](/Spells.aspx?ID=343)

</column>
name: Elven Pantheon

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)
